system.notes: Reroll (5). Ignores armour, also does +1d5 Morale damage. If torpedo tube damaged while holding this, does 3 additional critical hits to you and destroys torpedo tubes. If upkeep of torpedos is failed by 2 or more degrees, torpedos are defective, and explode when DM chooses (doesn't destroy torpedo tubes). Refer to Torpedo Rules block.
